scenes.text:
We are the Men's Basketball Team here at Cardiff Uni.

Basketball is a family, and the Cardiff University Men's Basketball Club exists to provide all our members with the best possible experience basketball can offer, regardless of individual skill level or background, both on and off the court.

We currently have 3 competing teams; 2 of which participate in the BUCS leagues, alongside another team in the Cardiff Basketball League.

We represent Cardiff Uni and compete at the highest level while giving players of every level the opportunity to contribute.

Our BUCS fixtures are played on Wednesdays, while our CBL team play in their Sunday training slot, and away games vary.

Our training schedule is available at our SU page, and training takes place at the Talybont Sports Complex.

We have two types of membership at different prices:

Standard Membership: £50.00
Erasmus Membership: £25.00
Our socials include pub trips and  club nights, group meetings and more, keep an eye out at sessions, GIAGs and our social medias for when we are hosting them.
